comments.text:
Whatever the case, if a food animal is to be disposed as per economical 
reasons, then the disposal should be quick and efficient. The chick grinder 
looks terrible but is actually a relatively merciful escape. The real issue 
is any extended painful process that occurs while the animal is alive and 
conscious, e.g. neck slitting, horn burning, tail clipping, live boiling, 
gassing, abusive handling, etc.

pysch, not to say going to one is negative in anyway. :) A sheltered life

little blood while my younger friend was watching Saving Private Ryan at 
age 8... Somehow I ended up getting passed all of that and will play games 
with almost any amount of gore.. it is really the context of the gore that 
can affect me.. Like I loves Gears of War but I hate the Gore in Happy 
Wheels.. >.>

comments.text:
As you can see, most took it pretty well. Children aren't that delicate, 
despite modern day adults wanting to think so. My mother told me that my 
grandparents owned a big farm when she was seven or so. My grandma thought 
that it was important for her to know how to butcher, plug, and prepare a 
chicken, so she showed her.
My mother didn't like it at all, but it didn't mess her up. Life was a lot 
harsher in the past for all ages, yet we consider them the more sober and 
innocent generations.

captions.text: Is this one of those pre-school games?

It's asking, "Can your pet do this?
Can your pet do that?"
Like lift weights, or plant plants.

I like duck.
Is this a duck?

No, wait! Ryan.
How do you spell Ryan?
His name is gonna be my dog named Dude.
Roxy, 'cause my dog's name is Roxy.
No, serious, it's the name of my cat.
I have to put it next to that.

Oh! Oh! Ooh. Dancin'.
Yeah, what do I do now?
Oh, I get to decorate it.

(giggles) Since it's Ryan,
it should be a mohawk.
You look cute! Aww, that's so adorable.

Okay, let's see what happens
when I touch the eye.

That is so creepy.
Oh my god.

Her eyes are gonna be pretty,
with little lashes.

He's wearing a scarf...
'cause he's a hipster. Okay?
Yeah, it's gonna have rosy cheeks. Done!

I did all the things or whatever.
Oh, okay.

You have to feed it to them?
This game is so weird.

You hungry?
Here you go. Here you go.

Aww, oh my god!
You eat the bag?!
Ugh! This is the most boringest game.

Let's feed you again.
Gotta get you to all the way.

I just keep feeding this thing?
How hungry is it?
How much more do I need to feed him?!

What's this?
Oh, it's a shower.

Let's do this.
I like this game!

Okay, now that's funny.
I was just watering him.

Doesn't like the bath.
But we're gonna get a bath.
We need to be showered, my chickie!
Uggh! He doesn't wanna get showered.
Oh, now I can play a game.

Okay, let's see.
A soccer ball. Whee.
What do I do with the soccer ball?

- (game dings)
- Now let's see what this bicycle thing does.

I like this game! 
Uh oh, what did I do.
Oh my god. Oh my god.
This is the worst game ever.
I'm literally about to throw up.
Oh, now I get the game!

That was freaky.
Why did I kill my pet?

I didn't even do anything.
I just pressed "ride".

I wanted to ride a bike,
then it made it put it into a can.
I thought this was a kids game.

Who would come up with this?
It's just so wrong.
It even had blood in it!

(whimpers) Oh, I'll have a bad nightmare
'cause of this! Thanks.

This is bad, and wrong, 
and blood gushing liars!

Thanks for making us can 
our pets here on the React Channel.

If you have any other games 
you want us to play, comment down below.
Subscribe to the React Channel, please.
